testcase.name: Sign in with invalid credential details
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the sign-in page..............................................passed When I enter invalid credentials............................................passed And I try to sign in into the account.......................................passed Then I should get a error message...........................................passed

testcase.classname: Trying to login into the webpage using invalid data
testcase.name: Try to Sign up with an existing email
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the sign-up page..............................................passed When I enter details with an existing email.................................passed When I try to submit the form...............................................passed Then I should get a error as account is already present.....................passed

testcase.classname: Successfully creating account and login in using the credential

testcase.system-out: Given I am on the sign-up page..............................................passed When I enter valid details..................................................passed When I try to submit the form...............................................passed Then my account should be created successfully..............................passed

testcase.classname: Successfully creating account and login in using the credential
testcase.name: Try to Sign in with the created account
